title: Crypto Library
author: Crypto Library
content: I don't know how reasonable my question is  The question arose in my mind so I mentioned it here . We all know that Elon Musk has bought the biggest social media Twitter. We also know that he always prefers his doge coins over everything else. Yesterday I saw his tweet that you have to run Twitter with money(commercial like Crypto projects) and it is understood that will do it with doge coins. Now my point is that now that Twitter is owned by Elon Musk, if that ever happens to be a barrier to Twitter users using Bitcoin, what can we have as an alternative to Twitter? Because now many big projects do their marketing,branding through Twitter.

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: 1. He doesn't own twitter yet, and won't for at least a few months2. I thought a lot of crypto projects do advertising through forums, exchanges and Facebook? I don't know if there's been a good altcoin service that's marketed exclusively on twitter but I doubt it.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Bitcoin does not depend on Twitter but new projects like DeFi, NFTs and Metaverse can depend on Twitter. You have nothing to worrry about if you think bitcoin can be affected, it won't.But what I am thinking about is that it is possible for Elon Musk to manipulate in a way doge will be more visible on Twitter while other coins will not, but I still think this will not be possible but just my assumption.But bitcoin does not depend on Twitter, there are other social media and forums too.But definitely that Elon Musk will try to manipulate the market.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Quote from: Crypto Library on May 07, 2022, 04:19:05 PMYesterday I saw his tweet that you have to run Twitter with money(commercial like Crypto projects) and it is understood that will do it with doge coins.Can you point is to a source? Also I'm really not 100% sure what you mean here, but like requiring DOGE to be able to use Twitter? If so, I heavily doubt it. Requiring any crypto or even just money in general to be able to use Twitter would be a company suicide.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Find an alternative. With Musk, Twitter won't continue to give us all the lies that we so patently want to hear.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: I believe it is too soon to start making our own conclusions on this matter, Twitter has yet to implement changes associated to the new management.Only time will say whether you like the changes or not, otherwise you would be only leaving the platform because you do not like the person behind it, instead the platform itself.

comments.author: FinalSolution
comments.body: It will take a while before Musk takes full possession of twitter and then i don't think he will take such drastic action against bitcoin and altcoins news and ads at least not immediately
